title: Hindustan Zinc to focus on batteries for energy transition
description: “Hindustan Zinc, one of India’s most valuable companies in the metals & minerals sector, already produces zinc and silver, two critical metals which will see ever increasing demand given their use in new, emerging technologies in addition to the traditional demand,” chairperson Priya Agarwal Hebbar told shareholders at the company’s annual general meeting on Monday.
